description: This file defines the ExoPlayerManager class which serves as a lifecycle-aware wrapper for managing a single ExoPlayer instance within an Android application. It handles player creation, media preparation, and release, facilitating media playback functionality.

classes.name: ExoPlayerManager
classes.description: A lifecycle-aware manager that encapsulates the creation, configuration, and release of an ExoPlayer instance, providing methods to prepare media streams and handle playback.

methods.name: createPlayer
methods.description: Creates and configures a new ExoPlayer instance with default settings.

methods.name: prepare
methods.description: Prepares the media player with a specified media URL, optional title, live stream flag, and resume position.

methods.name: release
methods.description: Releases the ExoPlayer instance and sets it to null for cleanup.
